name: Vivid Impactful Style (Yoneyama Mai [米山 舞]  Style Likeness) - LoRA/LoCon
description:
Vivid Impactful Style

An Artstyle Lora With High Compatibility

Important: Now, LoCon version is out!

  • Recommeneded prompts: Please check sample pictures.

  • Trigger word: vvi\(artstyle\), vvi\(face\),vvi\(eyes\),vvi\(oa\)

    Note: You can use vvi\(artstyle\) to trigger the artsyle lora. If you want to generate portriats, I would recommand you use vvi\(face\),vvi\(eyes\) thses two trigger words to get a better performance. You can use vvi\(oa\) to trigger the offcial_art like style.

  • Recommeneded Weight: 0.6-1 (You can adjust it by your perference.)

  • CFG scale: 5.5-7

  • Check Point/Base Model recommendation: Anything V4.5, Dan Mix

  • Special thanks:

    Artoria Caster (アルトリア・キャスター) - Lycoris

    Atelier Shallie - Shallotte Elminus LoRA

    (Lora usage in sample)

  • I am planning to release a LoHA version next week. No significant difference between LoCon and LoHa version. I will release a new version if I can get a larger training set.

  • How to use LoCon/LyCORIS? Please read instruction of a1111-sd-webui-locon.

    What's the different between v4g-lora and v4h-locon? Since I did not change the training set, I anticipate that they will have the same impact on your generated images. After hours of testing, I couldn't find any significant difference between these two models. The v4h-locon may be slightly superior to the v4g-lora.

    So, why am I still releasing this Locon? Because this v4h-locon has a file size advantage. It uses 100 mb less hard drive space,but still works great flawlessly.

    v4g-lora和v4h-locon有什么不同？由于我没有改变训练集，我预计它们对您生成的图像将具有相同的影响。经过几个小时的测试，我无法找到这两个模型之间的任何显着差异。v4h-locon可能略优于v4g-lora。

    那么，为什么我仍然要发布这个Locon模型呢？因为v4h-locon具有文件大小优势。Locon 模型比Lora模型小100 mb，但仍能完美无缺地运行。

    Comparison (对比): All samples were generated with Anything V4.5 or Dan Mix V2.3 （底模：Anything V4.5/Dan Mix V2.3）

    vvi\(artstyle\), 1girl,solo,long hair, blonde hair, city lights, cityscape, bandages, city, night, jacket, railing, outdoors, wind, black jacket, building, shirt, cigarette, floating hair, sky, brown hair,upper body, arms behind back, <lora:Vivid_Impactful_Style_locon_v4h:0.7>
    Negative prompt: EasyNegative
    Steps: 20, Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras, CFG scale: 5.5, Seed: 2308100336, Size: 512x1024, Model hash: 79846849a1, Clip skip: 2, ENSD: 31337

    vvi\(artstyle\), 1girl, solo, blue eyes, parted lips, brown hair, flower, looking at viewer, bangs, portrait, lying, blue flower, long hair, colorful, long sleeves, grass, close-up, liquid hair,<lora:Vivid_Impactful_Style_locon_v4h:0.7>
    Negative prompt: EasyNegative
    Steps: 20, Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras, CFG scale: 5.5, Seed: 872925101, Size: 512x768, Model hash: 79846849a1, Clip skip: 2, ENSD: 31337

    vvi\(artstyle\), 1girl, solo, flower, long hair, green eyes, looking at viewer, black background, smile, white flower, hair between eyes, floating hair, closed mouth, portrait, bangs, bare shoulders, grey hair, lily (flower), simple background, eyelashes, white hair, yellow eyes, eyes visible through hair, upper body,<lora:Vivid_Impactful_Style_locon_v4h:0.7>
    Negative prompt: EasyNegative
    Steps: 20, Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras, CFG scale: 5.5, Seed: 1147334132, Size: 768x768, Model hash: 79846849a1, Clip skip: 2, ENSD: 31337

    If you like my work,please give me a like <3.

    如果你喜欢我的模型请给我一个赞 <3.

    もし、私のモデルが気に入ったら、「いいね！」をクリックしてください<3。

modelVersions.name: v4.0h-LoCon
modelVersions.description:
• Please install the Locon extension before using!！

  • Using LoCon training method.

  • 100 mb less in file sizes than v4.0g-lora.

  • Same/slightly better than v4.0g-lora.

  • 请在使用前安装 Locon extension插件！

  • 使用LoCon训练方法。

  • 比v4.0g-lora文件大小少100 MB。

  • 效果与v4.0g-lora相同或略有改善。
